title: Tuesday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
BOB Episode 43: ENOUGH!

STONETOSS Episode 93: Holidaze

VEGFOLK FABLES Episode 100: A Brief Interruption

BEN GARRISON Episode 58: Patton Slap

CHUCK DIXON’S AVALON Episode 60: Washed Up

THE AWAKENER Episode 44: Wounding the World

SPACEKRAKEN Episode 6: Taking Precautions

In other comics-related news, Gary Shipman’s Kickstarter to color issues of TITAN MOUSE and PAKKINS’ LAND, both of which run regularly on Arktoons, has ten days left to run.
